attributes.action: make A.J Kirby the new writing tzar, and publish his writings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, believe that writing shapes our society. This is why we believe that we need to place a writer in a governmental position- Deptuty PM, perhaps, in order to gain some much needed persepective on events. Also, we believe that, andy kirby the writer, deserves publication, for his seminal work, The Magpie Trap.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
